_source.short_desc: Grow your people with easy-to-use software designed for HR and Managers to drive success through alignment, performance & development.
_source.long_desc:
Grow your people with a beautiful all-in-one performance management platform designed for HR and Managers to build high performing teams through alignment, performance and development.

Create alignment with Goals or OKRs, while automating appraisals, supporting Real-time Feedback and 1:1s for performance. Ask for feedback and Personal goals then help support development. Report on your impact using Engagement Surveys and in-depth HR analytics, with full onboarding and customer support included.
_source.pricing_details: Pricing is per user per month based on an annual subscription. There are other factors taken into consideration, so we request you contact us so we can work out the right plan for you.
_source.target_audience: Impraise is for HR teams looking to build a strong feedback culture using a simple, all-in-one performance management platform that helps drive success through alignment, performance and development.

category_features.name: Customizable Dashboard
category_features.definition: Alter the layout and content of dashboards

category_features.name: Goal Management
category_features.definition: Allows employees to set and manage work or career related goals.

category_features.name: KPI Monitoring
category_features.definition: Tracking the status of previously identified performance measurements

category_features.name: Negative Feedback Management
category_features.definition: Identify, track, and respond to negative feedback

category_features.name: Progress Tracking
category_features.definition: Reporting on how each task or process has advanced since its initiation

category_features.name: Strategic Planning
category_features.definition: At a high level, visualize a preferred outcome, define goals and identify specific steps to achieve them

related_products.short_desc: Trello is a collaboration tool that organizes your projects into boards. In one glance, Trello tells you what's being worked on.
related_products.features: "Organize anything, together." Trello is a collaboration tool that organizes your projects into boards. In one glance, Trello tells you what's being worked on, who's working on what, and where something is in a process. All your projects, all your tasks, all of your team--organized, accounted for, and easily visible at a glance. New users instantly understand the list and card metaphor and can be working on Trello within minutes.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why Asana is a top performer on Capterra.
related_products.features: Asana helps teams orchestrate their work-from daily tasks to strategic cross-functional initiatives. With Asana, teams are more confident, move faster, and accomplish more with less-no matter where they are located. More than 119,000 paying customers and millions of free organizations across 190 countries rely on Asana to manage everything from company objectives to digital transformation to product launches and marketing campaigns.

related_products.short_desc: Keep track of your business objectives and key results, in Confluence.
related_products.features: Confluence is an open source for all employers to use as their one OKR software tool. You can use it to track strategies, objectives, and key results while being accountable and transparent all at the same time!

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is an OKR management software with OKR templates, time tracking, Gantt charts, Kanban boards, easy-to-use reporting, and more.
related_products.features: Wrike is an OKR management software trusted by 20,000+ companies worldwide. Streamline your OKR management using Kanban boards, Gantt charts, time tracking, custom request forms with auto-assignment, performance reports, resource management and allocation, automated reporting, and shared workflows all in one place. Accelerate your delivery with Wrike's 400+ integrations. Customize your team's workflows to see progress at every step, and ensure your team achieves their goals with Wrike.

related_products.short_desc: 15Five is a people and performance platform that instantly upgrades each and every manager.
related_products.features: 15Five is a people and performance platform that instantly upgrades each and every manager. It works by combining employee engagement, continuous performance management, and manager effectiveness software with education, services, and community. At the heart of our approach is Best-Self Management, an evidence-inspired strategy for cultivating world-class managers and transforming organizations by unlocking every employee's potential.

related_products.short_desc: Targetprocess OKR support is designed to connect Enterprise OKRs with the experiments and enhancements any company is implementing.
related_products.features: Targetprocess is an Agile portfolio management tool to help you adopt and scale agile across your enterprise. Targetprocess OKR support is designed to connect Enterprise OKRs with the experiments and enhancements any company identified or is implementing in product or solution development. You can create the Objectives with Key Results at multiple levels in your organisation and connect them to work items (like Epics or Features) and Scrum Sprint Goals or SAFe PI Objectives.

related_products.short_desc: Aha! is the world's #1 product development software - trusted by 600,000+ product builders from companies of all sizes.
related_products.features: Aha! is the world's #1 product development software. Our suite of tools works seamlessly together to help teams turn raw concepts into valuable new capabilities - for customers and the business. Set strategy, crowdsource ideas, spark creativity, prioritize features, share roadmaps, manage releases, and plan development.

related_products.short_desc: Learn how leading midsize companies motivate and engage employees with online performance management software. See a free demo today!
related_products.features: Motivate and engage employees with Trakstar's performance management software. Unlimited online performance reviews, automated workflows and reports. Manage performance reviews easily across hundreds or thousands of employees in your organization. Learn how leading mid size companies use Trakstar to increase employee engagement, streamline goal management and create an environment of real-time feedback to drive business growth. See a free demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: Profit.co is the best platform for OKRs. The UX is designed to educate while executing your strategy.
similar_products.features: Profit.co is the best platform to roll out OKRs for your organization. Extremely easy to adopt and use. You can ensure complete alignment within your organization using Aligned OKRs that let you trickle down company-level OKRs to every individual contributor. Your 1-on-1 meetings will be extremely effective, focused on outcomes and results instead of effort and output. Profit.co Integrates with popular business apps improving quick adoption across the organization.

similar_products.short_desc: Enables Agile teams to visualize, plan, coordinate, and deliver big initiatives quickly, with clear insight into the value delivered.
similar_products.features: Planview LeanKit enables organizations and teams to use enterprise Kanban boards to visually track and manage the flow of work from strategy to delivery. Using Planview LeanKit, enterprises can scale Agile and manage, plan,?and coordinate work across Agile teams. Powerful OKR (objectives and key results) functionality helps identify the right goals to go after at each level of your organization and focuses execution on measurable outcomes. LeanKit integrates with apps your team uses every day.

similar_products.short_desc: From fast-growing start-ups to the Fortune 500, Culture Amp is designed to help build an employee experience your people will love.
similar_products.features:
With Culture Amp, prioritize and deliver impactful programs across performance management, development, and employee engagement - all in one intuitive platform. You can keep your organization aligned with easy, science-backed goal/OKR tools that help everyone stay on track. Discover how 6,000+ companies, including Salesforce, Unilever, and PwC use our trusted data, tools, and partnership to hit their goals and drive business success.

Get a demo at CultureAmp.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Lattice is the way engaged, high-performing teams do OKRs, feedback, and performance reviews to build a winning culture.
similar_products.features: Lattice integrates OKRs into a continuous people management platform that gives People Leaders solutions to build engaged, high-performing teams. They empower HR teams to make more strategic, data-driven decisions and build winning cultures. Find out why over 1,850+ companies trust Lattice for people management. Schedule a demo at Lattice.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Craft.io is the ultimate Product Management software for PMs who turn new ideas into great products. Start your 14 day free trial!
similar_products.features: Craft.io is the product management tool empowering product managers to do their work from feedback capturing, planning, decision making, roadmapping and more in one purpose-built tool that integrates with most commonly used platforms today. Craft.io becomes the product system of record: the authoritative data source backing up those important product decisions allowing product managers to be more confident, influence stakeholders, and lead with authority

similar_products.short_desc: Easily set and align strategic goals with your team. Set personal, team, and company goals in a simple and accessible system.
similar_products.features: Align everyone around strategic goals, insights, and actions in real-time. Set the vision and strategy by creating and promoting clear and measurable goals. Align individual efforts and foster collaboration around the highest priorities of the business. Increase business performance with real-time insights into the progress and impact of your goals.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkBoard is an enterprise-class OKR solution that unlocks growth by making alignment and accountability remarkably easy.
similar_products.features: WorkBoard is the pioneer of Enterprise Strategy and Results Management solutions and the only OKR offering for both large enterprises and later stage startups. It unlocks growth for its customers by making alignment and accountability remarkably easy. Customers relying on WorkBoard include Comcast, Microsoft, Cisco, Workday, Zuora, Cision, Malwarebytes, McKesson and others. Investors include Andreessen Horowitz, GGV Capital, M12 (formerly Microsoft Ventures) and Workday Ventures

similar_products.short_desc:
Strategy Getting Lost In Translation? Cascade is the only strategy platform you'll ever need.
Plan, manage & track all-in-one!
similar_products.features:
Cascade is a new way to run your organization  providing a suite of seamlessly integrated strategy modules, all designed with one simple purpose in mind - to make your vision happen. By putting strategy at the heart of everything, Cascade helps you to build an aligned, cohesive, empowered, and engaged workforce. 

Cascade is a strategic planning platform, strategic execution, AND tracking, all in one!

similar_products.short_desc: Weekdone is a trusted and innovative OKR software since 2013. OKR software and coaching to ensure a results-driven company culture.
similar_products.features: Weekdone is a trusted market leader and innovator in OKR software since 2013, loved by thousands of customers - we know what works. Set company, department, team and personal level OKRs. Access everything with just a few clicks. Link team OKRs to Company Objectives to see total progress by all teams. Keep OKRs in focus with weekly check-ins and automatic progress reports. Seamless integration with tools you already use. Personalized OKR coaching tailored to your company and industry.

similar_products.short_desc: Krezzo.com focuses on providing exceptional OKRs experiences to customers with its innovative OKR Platform & Professional Services.
similar_products.features: Krezzo.com focuses on providing exceptional OKR experiences to customers with high-quality online training and a purpose-built platform. similar_products.short_desc: An Agile Strategic management solution for enterprises to define and monitor the progress of strategic initiatives.
similar_products.features:
Core Strategy is an Agile Strategic management solution for enterprises which bridges the gap between the organization's strategy, goals, objectives, strategic initiatives and execution. It enables leaders to have increased visibility into the Organization's capabilities, resources and limitations when investing, divesting and prioritizing.

The Core-Strategy incorporates features such as:
- Define the organisational structure
- Plan
- Execute
- Evaluation
- Risk Mgmt

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Performance Management software provides organizations with the data they need to make decisions that are in line with company strategy. Business Performance Management solutions link performance measurements (key performance indicators, or KPIs) with strategic planning goals. The forecasting ability of these applications helps organizations analyze their actions and take corrective measures to meet performance goals. Business Performance Management software is related to Budgeting software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Dashboard software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Dashboard tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Dashboard software allows you to connect data from different systems and applications in one centralized interface. Business intelligence leads can use Dashboard software to show correlations and connections between disparate data. These systems provide opportunities for valuable business insights, productivity, and improved efficiency. Businesses interested in Dashboard software may also benefit from Business Intelligence software, Business Performance Management software, and Workflow Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Performance Appraisal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Performance Management software automates the process of reviewing employee performance, setting new objectives, and writing individual development plans. A type of Performance Management solution is 360 degree feedback software, which manages the process in which an employee completes a self-evaluation and is also evaluated by their manager, peers, and direct reports. Performance Management software is related to 360 Degree Feedback software, Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Management software automates task assignment, resource allocation and milestone tracking for all phases of a project. Project Management tools and systems may take one of several approaches: collaborative, when multiple people work on a project; top-down, when one person works on a project at a time; or integrated, when multiple aspects of the organization are involved. There are a variety of project management systems and tools that have been designed to fit your project needs. Project Management software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, Web Collaboration software and Workforce Management software. Find the best project management software for your organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reporting software applications allow real-time access to essential data as well as the rapid generation of multidimensional reports from diverse data sources. Among many other uses, Reporting software can generate financial statements, track the success of sales strategies, monitor responsiveness to regulatory compliance concerns and manage internal controls or security audits. Reporting software is related to Business Intelligence software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Task Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Task Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Task Management software allows groups of users to work together more cohesively to quickly and thoroughly complete projects. Features such as time tracking and project tracking ensure that all project tasks are covered and progress reports are up to date. Other functions include automatic time budgeting and timeline, email syncing, to-do list creation, collaborative interfaces for all users, and task reminders. Task Management software is related to Project Management software, Idea Management software, Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, and Workflow Management software.

supported_countries.name: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

_source.short_desc: Grow your people and your business with beautiful and easy-to-use performance appraisal software - in the office, or remote.
_source.long_desc:
Grow your people and your business with beautiful and easy-to-use performance appraisal software - in the office, or remote.

Easily build and schedule performance appraisals or other review types (including options for self-evaluation, external or 360 feedback) across your teams, and then relax knowing your people will be guided through the entire process. From selecting peers or externals for feedback, to automatically generated reports that help managers identify coaching opportunities.
_source.pricing_details: Pricing is per user per month based on an annual subscription. There are other factors taken into consideration, so we request you contact us so we can work out the right plan for you.
_source.target_audience: Impraise is for HR teams looking to build a strong feedback culture using a simple, all-in-one performance management platform that helps drive success through alignment, performance and development.

category_features.name: 360 Degree Feedback
category_features.definition: A process in which an employee receives feedback and a full analysis of how their peers, managers, and direct reports perceive them.

category_features.name: Compensation Management
category_features.definition: Organize and track payroll, bonuses, and additional company benefits and perks distributed to each employee

category_features.name: Customizable Templates
category_features.definition: Create, save, and re-purpose formatting

category_features.name: Customization
category_features.definition: Customize the levels of performance/achievement (i.e. numeric or alphabetic)

category_features.name: Individual Development Plans
category_features.definition: Document completed by employee to assist with career and personal development to reach short term and long term goals

category_features.name: On-going Performance Tracking
category_features.definition: Organize real time feedback and assessments on employees' skills and accomplishments to determine promotions or performance plans

category_features.name: Peer Appraisals
category_features.definition: Peer/teammate feedback and review on individual's performance

category_features.name: Review Cycle Tracking
category_features.definition: Follow the progression of a task associated with performance reviews

category_features.name: Self Assessment
category_features.definition: An individual's evaluation of his or her own strengths, weaknesses, and skills

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Skills Assessment
category_features.definition: Observe employees over a period of time to gain an understanding of their abilities to perform certain tasks

category_features.name: Weighted Performance Measures
category_features.definition: Assess skills, outcomes and results using preset metrics and averages

category_features.name: Anonymous Feedback
category_features.definition: Allow reviewers to provide anonymous feedback to encourage honest conversations

category_features.name: Continuous Feedback
category_features.definition: Provide ongoing performance feedback to employees on a regular basis, rather than giving feedback at designated times

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: View statistics and metrics about a document on a dashboard or by exporting a file

category_features.name: Progress Tracking
category_features.definition: Reporting on how each task or process has advanced since its initiation

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Rater Selection
category_features.definition: Select specific number and type of reviewers to provide feedback for an individual/participant (e.g. peers, supervisors, etc.)

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Surveys & Feedback
category_features.definition: Gauge satisfaction and receive information for improvement and success

category_features.name: Benchmarking
category_features.definition: Compare key metrics for the business against prominent players in the industry

category_features.name: Employee Recognition
category_features.definition: Acknowledge and reward employees for reaching specific goals and/or for exemplary performance.

category_features.name: Goal Management
category_features.definition: Allows employees to set and manage work or career related goals.

category_features.name: Negative Feedback Management
category_features.definition: Identify, track, and respond to negative feedback

category_features.name: Performance Management
category_features.definition: Organize and manage the accomplishments and development of employees

category_features.name: Pulse Surveys
category_features.definition: Surveys sent out at regularly scheduled intervals to track important metrics like job satisfaction, work environment, etc.

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

related_products.short_desc: ADP Workforce Now is a human capital management solution for companies with more than 50 employees.
related_products.features:
The core capabilities of the solution are human resources management, payroll, benefits, talent management, compliance, time & labor management, analytics & benchmarking. 
The fully integrated suite is built on a single database, which automates data synchronization across different components and helps users to minimize manual administrative tasks. The platform also integrates with other HR and business applications via the ADP Marketplace and APIs.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Improve your HR processes by building custom workflows on monday.com for your employee performance reviews using our advanced forms.
related_products.features: Improve your HR processes by building custom workflows on monday.com for your employee performance reviews using our advanced forms. In fact, you can manage your entire employee life cycle on this flexible platform. Simply start with one of our ready-made templates and create recruitment pipelines, employee onboarding tools, and engagement surveys all with a few clicks. Then automate your workflows so you can stop working on manual work, and focus on tasks that really make a difference.

related_products.short_desc: The award-winning BambooHR Performance Management makes performance reviews a pain-free experience.
related_products.features: The award-winning BambooHR Performance Management makes performance reviews a pain-free experience by modernizing the review process and focusing on a continuous feedback approach. Discover the new way of doing Performance Management by utilizing multiple review cycles, custom questions, employee-specific goals, confidential feedback, impromptu assessments, and reporting that provides powerful, real-time insights into your top performers, struggling employees, and employee/manager misalignments.

related_products.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee engagement platform that helps people be more motivated at work.
related_products.features: Motivosity is a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. With an average 95% user engagement rate, our software drives amazing results by making consistent recognition a part of your culture and making visible all the great work your team members are doing.

related_products.short_desc: 15Five is a people and performance platform that instantly upgrades each and every manager.
related_products.features: 15Five is a people and performance platform that instantly upgrades each and every manager. At the heart of our approach is Best-Self Management, an evidence-inspired strategy for cultivating world-class managers and transforming organizations by unlocking every employee's potential.

related_products.short_desc: Eliminate the stress and complexity of HR administration for you and your employees.
related_products.features: Zenefits is a SaaS cloud-based HR platform that helps small and mid-sized companies empower their workforce, manage change and stay compliant. Zenefits' People Platform delivers the most comprehensive, intuitive HR experience in the market. Its HR, Benefits, Payroll and Performance apps combine with advisory services and integrated partner apps to radically simplify HR administration  reducing paperwork and complexity so companies can focus on starting, running and growing their businesses.

related_products.short_desc: The BEST Workforce Management, HR & Employee scheduling solution that helps organizations manage shifts, payroll, leaves, overtime etc
related_products.features: UKG/Kronos Workforce Ready is a human capital management suite of tools on a single unified cloud platform that helps you manage the entire employee lifecycle from pre-hire to retire. Solutions for HR, recruiting, onboarding, time tracking, payroll, and more are easily accessed through a single intuitive interface. Automated and scalable tools provide a single source of truth with common reporting, dashboards, and robust workflows. Included self-service and mobile app allow easy, anytime access.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based HCM platform bringing together payroll, time + attendance, and HR for organisations with between 500 and 50,000 employees.
related_products.features: Dayforce is a global HCM platform that transforms the employee experience. It unifies data from across the entire employee lifecycle to enable better decision-making at every level. Dayforce is a comprehensive cloud platform that combines HR, payroll, workforce management and talent management in a single application. Our scalable platform is built with a single, flexible rules engine combined with real-time updates and calculations that help address complex regulatory requirements.

related_products.short_desc: WebHR is everyone's favorite and a global leader in Cloud HR - Helps you manage the most important asset in your company - your People!

similar_products.short_desc: We give HR a simplified, automated workflow to easily set-up and analyze performance reviews.
similar_products.features: ClearCompany is the easiest way to bring all of your employee performance review processes into a single, automated solution. ClearCompany's easy-to-use performance review software allows you to quickly set up reviews, including custom scoring tables, weighted sections, and free-form responses. ClearCompany's flat-rate pricing model allows you to send as many performance reviews as you need, as frequently as you need to, without worrying about the price tag.

similar_products.short_desc: Lattice is the way engaged, high-performing teams do performance management and appraisals to build a winning culture.
similar_products.features: Lattice integrates performance appraisals with continuous management tools into a people management platform that gives People Leaders solutions to build engaged, high-performing teams. They empower HR teams to make more strategic, data-driven decisions and build winning cultures. Find out why over 1,850+ companies trust Lattice for people management. Schedule a demo at Lattice.com.

similar_products.short_desc: From fast-growing start-ups to the Fortune 500, Culture Amp is designed to help build an employee experience your people will love.
similar_products.features: With Culture Amp, prioritize and deliver impactful programs across performance management, employee engagement, and development - all in one intuitive platform. By leveraging science-backed goal/OKR tracking, 1-on-1 templates, built-in calibrations, and 360? feedback, you can create a performance review process that supports managers and employees. Discover how 6,000+ companies, including Salesforce, Unilever, and PwC use our trusted data, tools, and partnership to build high-performing teams.

similar_products.short_desc: Performance Management Software that engages employees and embraces your organization's core values.
similar_products.features: Performance management software to help people reach their fullest potential by improving appreciation, coaching, and evaluation inside an organization.   Software features include Recognition, 9-Box Leadership Succession Tool, Goal Management, 360-Degree Feedback, Check-Ins, Engagement Surveys, and Performance Reviews.

similar_products.short_desc: bob's performance management gives you everything you need: streamlined 360-degree feedback, valuable insights, and actionable goals.
similar_products.features:
Managing performance reviews in bob generates data that provides valuable insights about your employees, managers, and your teams. This data enables you to track their progress and address any issues and concerns early.
Plus, you can easily set up new performance cycles within bob, customize them per site, and define which team members (no matter their location) will be part of the cycle.

similar_products.short_desc: The First Multi-Channel Performance Management Platform OKR for your hard to reach non-desk based employees without downloading an App.
similar_products.features:
StaffCircle provides an advanced but easy to use mobile friendly Performance Management and 360 Agile Appraisal system for any size of Organisation. 

Unify and improve 2-way Internal performance with easy and quick 360 Appraisals using mobile or web. Objectives OKR can be set by the user or Manager. Managers and users can request quick One2One Reviews. Add self Appraisals or 180, 270, 360 to your Performance Reviews and then link to Awards, Rewards or even career progression.

similar_products.short_desc: ChartHop is a new People Analytics platform, bringing disparate sources of people data together in a dynamic, visual, & actionable way.
similar_products.features:
ChartHop is a new People Analytics platform, bringing disparate sources of people data together in a dynamic, visual, & actionable way.

Unlike legacy People Analytics solutions, ChartHop is designed to be used by the whole organization. 

Now, HR and people managers alike can have the insights they need to make real-time strategic decisions about their organizations. This helps companies improve organizational health, drive alignment and accountability, and save money.

similar_products.short_desc: Define success for your organization and connect employees to your purpose with a continuous performance management tool.
similar_products.features: Ensuring that your people support your most important KPIs can be challenging. However, the right performance management software makes it easier to define success for your organization and connect employees to your mission. Cornerstone Performance provides you with tools to align your people and business strategy. Rich insights into your talent landscape allow you to quickly identify and mobilize employees for your organization's top priorities.

similar_products.short_desc: WebHR is everyone's favorite and a global leader in Cloud HR - Helps you manage the most important asset in your company - your People!
similar_products.features: WebHR is revolutionizing the way HR works. WebHR is a Social all-in-one Cloud based HR Software for Small & Medium Enterprises that handles everything from Hire to Retire, in the most innovate way. WebHR not only saves money to the companies, but also boosts productivity, saves space and make inter and intra-office communications fast, reliable and more efficient. WebHR assists in managing a companys most important asset - its People.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 360 Degree Feedback software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 360 Degree Feedback tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 360 Degree Feedback software is designed to help human resource departments gather all-around information about an employee. Unlike performance assessment software, 360 Degree Feedback applications allow organizations to collect information not only from superiors but also from peers and subordinates, as well as clients. The information collected can be used either for assessment or training purposes. 360 Degree Feedback software is related to Performance Appraisal software, Survey software and Human Resource software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Recognition software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Recognition tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Recognition solutions assist with keeping employees feeling engaged and appreciated at work. This software facilitates peer recognition on corporate and team discussion boards, administration of awards and loyalty programs, as well as extensive reporting and analytics. Employee Recognition software is related to HR software and Talent Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mentoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mentoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mentoring software streamlines administration of corporate mentoring programs, including matching mentors to mentees, conducting surveys, and tracking mentees' progress.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.
